# --
# $Id: OTRS-PATCHES.txt,v 1.1 2010-07-20 10:43:02 mn Exp $
# --
# A list of all patches applied to CKEditor for OTRS.
# --

-   _sources/plugins/image/dialogs/patch-20100311-image-js.patch
    OTRS Bug#4503: Removes Border Option from Image Dialog

-   plugins/image/dialogs/patch-20100311-image-js.patch
    OTRS Bug#4503: Removes Border Option from Image Dialog

-   _sources/plugins/dialogui/patch-20100311-plugin-js.patch
    Adds additional hidden fields to the image upload

-   _source/plugins/aspell/dialogs/patch-20091216-aspell-js.patch
    Adds the right server script to the code

-   _source/plugins/aspell/spellerpages/patch-20091216-spellChecker-js.patch
    Comments out some not necessary options

-   _source/plugins/aspell/spellerpages/patch-20091216-spellchecker-html.patch
    Adds additional hidden fields to the spell checker

-   skins/default/patch-20100311-editor-css.patch
	Changes the width of format panel and font-size dropdown
	Default skin is a patched copy of Kama skin with new icon set
